name: Precision Blast
abilities: Attack for 5 damage in the middle lane.
flavour: Green Shadow's approach is right down the middle.

name: Sunburn
abilities:
Do 2 damage.
You get +1{{Sun}} for the rest of the game.
flavour: Solar Flare never met a sunscreen strong enough to stop her.

name: Uncrackable
abilities:
Your Hero can't be hurt this turn.
Draw a card.
flavour: Wall-Knight laughs, "A thousand broken nutcrackers tell the story."

name: Devour
abilities: Destroy a Zombie with the lowest Health.
flavour: Chompzilla enjoys eating Zombies whole. She does not enjoy the indigestion that follows.

name: Tater Toss
abilities: Make a {{Hothead: Hothead include:t}}.
flavour: Spudow is one tranquil tuber. Still, sometimes he loses his head.

name: Peel Shield
abilities:
Plants can't be hurt this turn.
Draw a card.
flavour: Orange you glad Citron is here to protect you?

name: Power Pummel
abilities: Attack each Zombie on the Ground for 2 damage.
flavour: "Knuckle sandwiches for all my enemies!"

name: Mush-Boom
abilities:
Make a {{Poison Mushroom:Poison Mushroom}}.
Do 2 damage to a Zombie there.
flavour: Night Cap and his mushroom friends are not to be truffled with.

name: Goatify
abilities: Transform a Zombie with the highest Attack into a 1{{Strength}}/1{{Heart}} {{Goat:Goat c:0}}.
flavour: Rose turns Zombies into goats because... GOATS!

name: Blazing Bark
abilities: A Plant gets +4{{Strength}}.
flavour: Captain Combustible knows how to light a fire under his teammates.

name: Genetic Amplification
abilities: Conjure a 2{{Sun}}-cost {{Plant: c:2 type:p}}. It gets +2{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}, Amphibious, and Team-Up.
flavour: The modifications are controversial, sure. But the results are hard to argue with.

name: Carried Away
abilities: Move a Zombie. It gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}. Then it does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: It's just Super Brainz' way of sharing the wonder of flight with his fellow Zombies.

name: Slammin' Smackdown
abilities: Destroy a Plant with 4{{Strength}} or less.
flavour: The Smash's wrestling moves are real all right. Too real. Just ask any Plant.

name: Triple Threat
abilities: Make two {{Impfinity Clones:Impfinity Clone include:t}} in random lanes.
flavour: That's how you get Imps.

name: Shrink Ray
abilities:
A plant gets -3{{Strength}}.
Draw a card.
flavour: Rustbolt gets a kick out of belittling Plants.

name: Stayin' Alive
abilities:
Do 3 damage to a Plant.
Heal your Hero for 3.
flavour: For Electric Boogaloo, "alive" is a relative term.

name: Frozen Tundra
abilities: {{Frozen}}Freeze all Plants.
flavour: Brain Freeze has a knack for making the Plants chill out.

name: Eureka
abilities: Conjure any three cards.
flavour: Professor Brainstorm's ideas are brilliant... totally random, but brilliant.

name: Witch's Familiar
abilities: Make {{Zom-Bats:Zom-Bats include:token}}.
flavour: Immorticia was cleaning her belfry when, lo and behold, she found bats in there.

name: Missile Madness
abilities: Do 3 damage to a Plant and 1 damage to all other Plants.
flavour: For Z-Mech, any target is a good target.

name: Octo-Pult
abilities: Make a 3{{Strength}}/2{{Heart}} {{Octo-Pet:Octo-Pet include:t}} with Amphibious, {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: Octopus incoming! Two words a Plant never wants to hear.

name: Terror-Former 10,000
abilities: Conjure an {{Environment:type:e is:z}} and a {{trick:type:t is:z}}. All Environment and Trick cards in your hand cost 1{{Brain}} less.
flavour: This is Huge-Gigantacus' greatest invention ever. It's also his only invention. But it's best not to point that out to him.
